scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/we-applet" "npm run start -w we" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground" "npm run launch:devhub"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cargo nextest run -j 1
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w we && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack ./workdir --recursive
scripts.prepare: rimraf DevHub && curl -L --output DevHub.webhapp https://github.com/holochain/devhub-gui/releases/download/v0.12.0/DevHub.webhapp && hc web-app unpack DevHub.webhapp && extract-zip web_assets.zip ./DevHub/ui && rimraf web_assets.zip DevHub.webhapp
